title: Oxford Summer Language Program
description: A 4-week English immersion program at Oxford University, designed for international students to improve their academic language skills.

title: Tokyo Tech Research Internship
description: A hands-on internship program for undergraduate students interested in engineering and technology research, hosted by Tokyo Institute of Technology.

title: Harvard Innovation Bootcamp
description: An intensive entrepreneurship program designed to teach innovation and startup principles through practical team-based challenges at Harvard University.

title: Berlin Summer Art Workshop
description: A creative visual arts program for students and aspiring artists, featuring workshops and exhibitions in the heart of Berlin.

title: Paris Summer Language Program
description: A 4-week French immersion program at the Sorbonne University, designed for international students to improve their academic language skills.

title: Seoul Tech & Culture Exchange
description: A unique 6-week program combining technology workshops with Korean language and culture immersion, hosted by KAIST.

title: Barcelona Digital Design Camp
description: A 3-week summer camp focused on UI/UX design, digital tools, and creative thinking, held in one of Europe’s most artistic cities.

title: Toronto AI & Robotics Bootcamp
description: An intensive program introducing high school and undergraduate students to artificial intelligence and robotics through hands-on labs and challenges.

title: Cape Town Marine Biology Expedition
description: A research-focused summer expedition exploring marine ecosystems along the South African coast, including scuba diving certification.

title: Helsinki Game Development Lab
description: A collaborative program for aspiring game developers, offering mentorship in Unity and Unreal Engine development in Finland’s startup capital.
